INTRO_SECTION.TITLE: Padel Court Manufacturers and installers
INTRO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Based in Spain, at Portico Sport, we stand for quality, innovation, and excellence in customer service. With strong engineering at our core, we offer a complete turnkey solution that combines padel courts and sports canopies—100% designed and manufactured in-house for total quality control.

In 2023, we inaugurated a new 110,000+ sqft manufacturing site, positioning Portico Sport as the largest and most technologically advanced padel court manufacturer in the industry. This facility enables us to deliver fast, high-quality production—whether you're looking for an indoor padel court supplier, an outdoor padel court supplier, or a fully customized project.
INTRO_SECTION.TITLE_2: Leading global builders and suppliers of premier Padel courts and canopy installations

INTRO_SECTION_UK.TITLE: Padel Court Manufacturers and installers in UK
INTRO_SECTION_UK.DESCRIPTION:
Located in Congleton, near Manchester, our UK office and warehouse serve as the hub for our operations—positioning us as one of the leading padel court suppliers in the UK . From here, we collaborate with our expert team on growing padel across every corner of the UK.

Our strategically located warehouse facilitates efficient material shipping processes, both domestically and to neighbouring countries, enabling us to swiftly deliver our products and services to clients.

Based in Spain, Portico Sport is one of the leading builders of premier padel courts and installation of canopies globally. The company counts with more than 15 years of experience in the industry, presence in over 35 countries and +4,000 courts installed.

At Portico Sport UK, we combine this international know-how with local insight, delivering the high-quality standards expected from a top-tier padel court supplier in the UK. Our engineering expertise enables us to provide a complete turnkey solution, combining courts and canopies with 100% in house design and manufacturing.

In 2023 the company inaugurated a new manufacturing site, in Spain, expanding over 10,000 square meters making it the largest and most technologically advanced padel court manufacturer in the industry. With the latest technology and fully in-house production, we deliver custom-built padel courts and canopies across the UK.
INTRO_SECTION_UK.SALES_EMAIL: For sales queries please contact sales@porticosport.uk

INTRO_SECTION_USA.TITLE: Padel Court Manufacturers and installers in the USA
INTRO_SECTION_USA.DESCRIPTION:
Based in Spain, Portico Sport is one of the leading Padel courts & canopies manufacturers globally. With over 15 years of industry experience, a presence in more than 35 countries, and more than 4,000 courts worldwide, we are recognized as a trusted padel court supplier across Europe, the USA, and beyond.

At Portico Sport, we are synonymous with quality, innovation, and excellence in customer service. Our engineering DNA allows us to offer a complete turnkey solution, combining courts and canopies with 100% in-house design and manufacturing.

In 2023, we inaugurated a new 110,000+ square foot manufacturing site—currently the largest and most technologically advanced in the padel industry. This facility supports our ability to meet the growing demand for both outdoor and indoor padel courts, with efficient production and global shipping capabilities.

As we expand our presence in the USA, we bring our world-class padel expertise to a fast-growing market, with a special focus on padel court construction and transparent, competitive padel tennis court cost guidance.

Since shipping our first court to New York in 2021, we’ve grown our footprint in the United States with facilities and projects in New York, Texas, and Florida. Today, we proudly manage installations in major cities including Los Angeles, San Diego, San Francisco, Dallas, Boston, Chicago, San Antonio, and Houston.

Whether you're looking for a padel courts indoor supplier, an outdoor padel court supplier, or a fully customized project, we deliver tailor-made solutions that meet the demands of clubs, private facilities, and professional events alike. As a trusted padel court event supplier, we also support temporary or semi-permanent installations for exhibitions, tournaments, and brand activations around the world.

INTRO_SECTION_OCEANIA.TITLE: Padel Court Manufacturers and installers in Oceania
INTRO_SECTION_OCEANIA.DESCRIPTION:
Welcome to Portico Sport Oceania - Shaping the Future of Padel in Australia & New Zealand

As the leading of premium Padel courts, we’re committed to elevating the sport across the region. We’re delivering world-class facilities and creating the best local Padel experience. Together, we’re building the foundations for padel’s growth, from community clubs to top-tier venues.

Join us and be part of the movement transforming Padel in Oceania!

INTRO_SECTION_ZA.TITLE: Padel court manufacturers and installers in South Africa
INTRO_SECTION_ZA.DESCRIPTION:
Padel is experiencing significant growth in South Africa, quickly becoming one of the country's fastest-developing sports. This boom has been partly driven by contributions from Padel court manufacturers like Portico Sport, a global leader in the sector, playing a crucial role in the sport's expansion. Portico Sport has already completed notable projects such as Virgin Active Padel Club The Glen and Atlantic Padel Table View in Cape Town.

The most sought-after courts in South Africa include the Club, Panoramic, and, notably, the patented Club Force 80 and Panoramic Force 80 by Portico Sport, unique in the market. The Force 80 Padel courts feature a superior brace design and a special anchoring system, capable of withstanding hurricane-force winds, making them ideal for areas with extreme weather conditions. Their innovative construction has positioned these Padel courts as the most durable on the market, reinforcing Padel's growth in South Africa and securing its expansion across the country.

We hope that Padel will continue its expansion in other cities such as Johannesburg, Pretoria, Durban, Port Elizabeth, Bloemfontein, Nelspruit or Kimberley.

ITEM_2.TITLE: Custom corners

ITEM_5.TITLE: Customized net

ITEM_6.TITLE: Integrated benches
ITEM_6.DESCRIPTION: Ensure player comfort with benches designed to seamlessly fit your court’s aesthetics.

ITEM_7.TITLE: Enclosures and wind shields
ITEM_7.DESCRIPTION: Maintain uninterrupted play, regardless of weather conditions.

ITEM_8.TITLE: Entry protections
ITEM_8.DESCRIPTION: Secure and enhance the court entrances with bespoke designs.

ITEM_9.TITLE: Hangers and hooks
ITEM_9.DESCRIPTION: Add practical elements that keep your facility organized and professional.

COMPLEMENTS_SECTION_USA.TITLE: Premium Padel Court Construction in the US: Fast & Reliable
COMPLEMENTS_SECTION_USA.SUBTITLE: Portico Sport is a renowned padel court company revolutionizing the USA. With a deep understanding of the sport’s evolution and the specific needs of the local market, we are redefining how padel is played, experienced, and showcased across the country. From high-performance builds to visually striking designs, our fully customizable solutions are crafted to reflect each client’s unique vision, brand, and space.

ITEM_1.TITLE: Foundation and platforms
ITEM_1.DESCRIPTION: We are experts in the construction and repair of asphalt and concrete slabs, as well as structural foundations, ensuring a solid base for all our installations. With a dedicated team of specialists in the USA, we also provide tailored solutions to meet local regulations and standards.

ITEM_2.TITLE: Structures
ITEM_2.DESCRIPTION: Our metallic structures are crafted from galvanized steel and coated with oven-baked thermoplastic polyester paint. For indoor courts, we apply a single layer, while outdoor installations receive two layers, all designed to meet the highest industry standards.

ITEM_3.TITLE: Glasses
ITEM_3.DESCRIPTION: Each Padel court is equipped with tempered safety glass, either 10 or 12 mm thick, depending on the project’s requirements. All glass installations strictly adhere to the regulations established for these types of facilities.

ITEM_4.TITLE: Artifitial turf
ITEM_4.DESCRIPTION: We offer premium quality artificial turf in collaboration with leading turf companies. Our latest-generation turf comes with straight or curly fibers, designed to enhance gameplay and durability.

ITEM_5.TITLE: Lighting
ITEM_5.DESCRIPTION: Our LED projectors are sourced from the most reputable manufacturers, providing optimal lighting for every Padel court, both indoors and outdoors.

ITEM_6.TITLE: Customize your court
ITEM_6.DESCRIPTION: Personalize your court with integrated benches, engraved corners featuring your club's logo, and screen-printed nets to create a unique playing experience tailored to your brand.

INTRO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Portico Sport se posiciona como uno de los líderes globales en la fabricación de canchas de pádel y cubiertas deportivas. Con más de 15 años de experiencia en el sector y sede en España, la empresa ha instalado más de 4.000 canchas de pádel en más de 35 países, y ahora busca tener mayor presencia en México, teniendo un equipo listo para trabajar en cualquier área del País.

Portico Sport se distingue por su compromiso con la calidad y la satisfacción del cliente. Gracias a nuestra experiencia en ingeniería, ofrecemos un servicio completo “llave en mano” que combina diseño y fabricación propia de canchas de pádel y cubiertas deportivas 100% en nuestra fábrica, garantizando expertas soluciones a medida para cada proyecto.

En 2023, Portico Sport inauguró una moderna planta de producción de más de 10.000 m², consolidándose como el mayor fabricante de canchas de pádel con el uso de la tecnología más avanzada en la industria. Este proceso de fabricación 100% interno nos permite entregar canchas de pádel duraderas y con una calidad superior, ideales para las exigencias del mercado mexicano y otros mercados internacionales.

FAQS_SECTION.TITLE: Consulta a fabricantes de canchas de pádel en México
FAQS_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Preguntas Frecuentes

QUESTIONS.question: ¿Cuáles son las dimensiones estándar de una cancha de pádel?
QUESTIONS.answer: Las dimensiones estándar para una cancha de pádel son de 20 metros de largo y 10 metros de ancho.

QUESTIONS.question: ¿Qué equipo es necesario para instalar una cancha de pádel?
QUESTIONS.answer: Los componentes esenciales para instalar una cancha de pádel son: estructura de metal, paredes de vidrio y césped artificial. También es común incluir sistemas de iluminación, redes y otros accesorios que son opcionales para el disfrute de la cancha.

QUESTIONS.question: ¿Cuál es el costo de importar e instalar una cancha de pádel en México?
QUESTIONS.answer: El costo puede variar según el modelo de cancha de pádel que elijas y el número de canchas que planeas instalar. También influyen factores como la ubicación y los permisos locales. En Portico Sport ofrecemos una excelente relación calidad-precio para importar tu cancha de pádel a México.

QUESTIONS.question: ¿Qué tipo de mantenimiento necesita una cancha de pádel?
QUESTIONS.answer: En México, una cancha de pádel requiere mantenimiento regular para mantener sus condiciones óptimas. Las tareas incluyen limpieza de la superficie, revisión de las estructuras y los vidrios, reemplazo del césped artificial cuando sea necesario, y atención inmediata a cualquier signo de desgaste o daño.

QUESTIONS.question: ¿Se requieren permisos especiales para instalar una cancha de pádel en México?
QUESTIONS.answer: Sí, es necesario contar con permisos y autorizaciones locales. Nuestro equipo te puede ayudar a gestionar los trámites necesarios ante las autoridades mexicanas para que tu proyecto esté en regla.

QUESTIONS.question: ¿Se puede personalizar el diseño de una cancha de pádel?
QUESTIONS.answer: Claro, ofrecemos opciones de personalización para canchas de pádel en México. Puedes elegir colores específicos para la estructura y el césped, , múltiples accesorios personalizados para la cancha y características adicionales que se adapten a la visión de tu proyecto.

QUESTIONS.question: ¿Cuánto tiempo toma instalar una cancha de pádel?
QUESTIONS.answer: El tiempo de instalación varía según factores como la necesidad de preparación del terreno, la ubicación, la complejidad del diseño y las condiciones climáticas. Por lo general, una instalación completa puede tardar varias semanas.

QUESTIONS.question: ¿Cuáles son las canchas de pádel más duraderas en el mercado?
QUESTIONS.answer: Portico Sport es líder en innovación con modelos como Club Force 80 y Panoramic Force 80, que ofrecen una durabilidad excepcional. Estas canchas están diseñadas para resistir condiciones climáticas extremas, siendo ideales para diferentes entornos en México y asegurando un alto rendimiento y una larga vida útil.

MOBILE_COURT.NAME: Mobile
MOBILE_COURT.SUBTITLE: Introducing the latest innovation in Padel court technology
MOBILE_COURT.TITLE: Mobile Padel Court
MOBILE_COURT.DETAIL_TITLE: Mobile Padel Courtsystem patented by Portico Sport
MOBILE_COURT.DESCRIPTION:
The first of its kind, our patented Mobile Court system, is revolutionizing the market. Meticulously designed by our Engineering Department, this system can make the difference expanding the range of possibilities to install a court making it possible where previously wasn´t.

This groundbreaking court eliminates the need for costly ground preparation expenses and tedious permitting processes. With only a flat permeable surface required to be installed, our court offers unparalleled convenience and cost savings.
MOBILE_COURT.LITTLE_DESCRIPTION: Enjoy Padel anywhere, temporarily or permanently, a Padel court that will save you time and money.
MOBILE_COURT.CONTACT_TITLE_1: Do you want a Mobile Padel Court?
MOBILE_COURT.CONTACT_SUBJECT: New petition from Mobile Padel Court
MOBILE_COURT.CONTACT_BUTTON: I want a Mobile Padel Court

FIRST_SECTION.TITLE: Place our Mobile Padel Court solution anywhere!
FIRST_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
In Portico Sport, we specialize in building high-quality Mobile Padel courts tailored to your specific needs. Our Mobile Padel court system is designed for both temporary and permanent installations, ensuring that you can set up your court wherever it’s needed. Whether you’re organizing a tournament or looking to add a Padel court to a specific location, our Mobile solutions provide the flexibility and durability you require.

Our team of expert Padel court builders ensures that every aspect of your Mobile Padel court meets the highest standards. From the foundation to the fencing, lighting, and playing surface, we offer a complete package designed for optimal performance.

What sets our court apart is its innovative counterweight box system, ensuring sturdy support without the need for ground anchoring.

This means you can install this court in a particular location for years to come, or effortlessly relocate it whenever needed without damaging the ground where it was installed.

But that’s not all – opposite to other “mobile” solutions, our system allows for the same play experience with traditional anchored courts, same robustness and wind resistance as our club court model, that why we offer the same 10-year structural warranty

BENEFITS_SECTION.TITLE: Experience the benefits of our innovative Mobile Padel court system

BENEFITS.footer: Less bureaucratic issues and streamlined processes, you can enjoy quicker concessions, saving valuable time and expenses on ground works.
Rest assured with our 10-year warranty on the structural integrity of our mobile courts, designed to withstand wind speeds like our anchored club court.

Suitable for both indoor and outdoor installations, can be easily transported to various environments and locations, making it ideal for events or installations where drilling holes to anchor the court is not possible.
Our Mobile Court offers attractiveness for leasing opportunities, reducing risk and commitment.
Crafted with premium materials for maximum strength and durability, our mobile courts offer the same premium quality as a permanent court.

STRUCTURE_SECTION.TITLE: Mobile Padel Court Structures: Durable & Flexible
STRUCTURE_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Experience the excellence of our premium quality court structure
STRUCTURE_SECTION.TEXT:
Crafted with galvanized steel structure, our court ensures maximum resistance to abrasion and oxidation.

The court structure consists of galvanized S275JR steel profiles, anchored securely to the ground using anchor plates. The side and top frames are complemented by electro-welded mesh in accordance with UNE-EN-10223-4 standards.

To prevent vibrations of the mesh, the structure includes intermediate scaffolding.

Fastening the structure to the pavement is achieved with countersunk metal anchors measuring M8X80 mm. Plus, its assembly process is seamless, thanks to self-locking safety screws and nuts made of galvanized steel.

The structure of Portico Sport padel courts undergoes manufacturing processes including cutting-edge industrial technologies such as:

  • Laser cutting guarantees precise cuts and delivers high-quality finishing.
  • A fully automated robotic welding assembly line guarantees the quality of welds, preventing potential oxidation in the future.

SIZING_SECTION.TITLE: Mobile Padel Court dimensions
SIZING_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: The standard dimensions for a Mobile Padel court are 20 meters long by 10 meters wide. This is the official size for professional Padel courts, providing ample space for competitive play. We also offer customized sizes depending on the available space and intended use. Our Mobile Padel courts are built to meet the highest standards of quality and safety, ensuring a premium experience for all players.
SIZING_SECTION.OUTDOOR:
12 steel counterweight boxes located on the sides.

Length: 20 m (interior measurements) / 20,96 m (exterior measurements of the court).

Width: 10 m (interior measurements) / 11,45 m (exterior measurements of the court).
SIZING_SECTION.INDOOR:
4 steel counterweight boxes located on the sides.

Length: 20 m (interior measurements) / 20,67 m (exterior measurements of the court).

Width: 10 m (interior measurements) / 11,45 m (exterior measurements of the court).

IMAGE.alt: Indoor and outdoor Mobile court sizes
Mobile court patented by Portico Sport

GLASS_SECTION.TITLE: High-Quality Glass for Mobile Padel Courts
GLASS_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Tempered Safety Glass in Every Court!
GLASS_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Discover unrivaled safety and durability in our padel courts. Each court features tempered safety glass, available in either 10 or 12 mm thickness, tailored to the specific requirements of your project. Rest assured, our glass meets all regulatory standards for installations of this kind. Partnering with esteemed Spanish manufacturers boasting CE marking, we guarantee top-notch quality in every aspect of our construction.

GLAZING is done using clear tempered glass with polished edges, fixed to the metal structure using countersunk polyethylene bushings, galvanized screws and neoprene gaskets for perfect glass/metal support, with a total of 6 anchor holes. Our glass panels boast outstanding physical and mechanical properties, including impact resistance and optimal flatness.

PAINT_SECTION.TITLE: Custom Paint Solutions for Padel Court Structures
PAINT_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Did you know that now you can add a splash of color to your court?
PAINT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Discover the epitome of distinction in padel court construction with a range of lacquer types, providing endless options to paint your court's structures in vibrant hues. Our LACQUERED PAINT offers maximum resistance to abrasion and oxidation. Choose the RAL color that suits your preference and stand out on with our customizable color options.

IMAGES.alt: Exterior of a yellow mobile court
Exterior of a yellow mobile court

LIST: INDOOR: powder coating formulated with thermos-fusible resins.
OUTDOOR: thermo-fusible powder primer treatment with a high zinc content formulated to improve the corrosion protection of galvanized steel.

HOT DIP GALVANIZED: treatment of molten zinc at a temperature of 450 ºC in order to achieve high protection of parts against corrosion in marine environments. Includes powder coating formulated with thermo-fusible resins.

TURF_SECTION.TITLE: High-Performance Turf for Mobile Padel Courts
TURF_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Experience Unmatched Performance on our Turf!
TURF_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
We partner with the top turf companies to ensure your court receives premium quality turf. Every court is equipped with the latest generation turf engineered with textured monofilaments, featuring different thickness and pile heights, very low abrasion, made of polyethylene (PE) and specific additives with high resistance to wear and anti-UV treatment, resistant to heat and extreme weather fluctuations.

Stabilization fill and ballast using rounded, washed and dried silica sand, with 97% silica, granulometry between 0,2 - 0,6 mm in an approximate quantity of 10-15 Kg/m2, depending on the lawn model.

Our cutting-edge turf guarantees padel players an optimized playing speed and improved ball bounce and offers the option of straight or curled fibers and is available in a wide variety of colors.

LIGHTING_SECTION.TITLE: Advanced Lighting for Mobile Padel Courts
LIGHTING_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Illuminate Your Game with Portico Sport's Padel Court Lighting!
LIGHTING_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Enjoy the ultimate LED lighting solution for padel courts, exclusively offered by Portico Sport in partnership with leading specialists in the field.

Our padel court lighting ensures optimal illumination and uniformity across all playing areas. From the net to the access zones, background, sidelines, and high ball zones, our lighting solution eliminates glare and shadows, providing players with unparalleled visibility and performance.

The quality of our projectors, designed to withstand impacts up to IK10, with IP66-IP67 sealing degrees and resistance to voltage surges of 4kV - 6kV, combined with high heat dissipation capabilities of the housings, allows for an extended lifespan of our projectors, with a warranty of up to 5 years.

Our projectors are designed to cover all types of courts specified in the European standard for sports lighting (UNE-EN-12193:2020), ranging from recreational use (Class III) to professional competitions or televised broadcasts (Class I - NIDE standard).

COST_SECTION.TITLE: How Much Does It Cost to Build a Mobile Padel Court?
COST_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: The cost to build a Mobile Padel court varies depending on several factors, such as the materials used, size of the court, and the location of installation. Typically, the price ranges from €18,000 (EXWORK). This includes not only the Padel court itself but also additional features like professional-grade glass panels, lighting systems, and anti-slip surfaces. Our team can provide a custom quote based on your specific requirements.

INSTALLATION_SECTION.TITLE: Why Choose Portico Sport for Your Mobile Padel Court?
INSTALLATION_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: At Portico Sport, we pride ourselves on delivering top-quality Padel courts that are both durable and easy to install. Our Mobile Padel courts are designed with flexibility in mind, allowing for quick assembly and disassembly without compromising on quality. Whether you need a Padel court for an event, a temporary installation, or even a semi-permanent structure, our Mobile solutions are the best in the market.

TURF_SECTION.TITLE: High-Performance Turf for Panoramic Padel Courts
TURF_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Experience Unmatched Performance on our Turf!
TURF_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
We partner with the top turf companies to ensure your court receives premium quality turf. Every court is equipped with the latest generation turf engineered with textured monofilaments, featuring different thickness and pile heights, very low abrasion, made of polyethylene (PE) and specific additives with high resistance to wear and anti-UV treatment, resistant to heat and extreme weather fluctuations.

Stabilization fill and ballast using rounded, washed and dried silica sand, with 97% silica, granulometry between 0,2 - 0,6 mm in an approximate quantity of 10-15 Kg/m2, depending on the lawn model.

Our cutting-edge turf guarantees padel players an optimized playing speed and improved ball bounce and offers the option of straight or curled fibers and is available in a wide variety of colors.

LIGHTING_SECTION.TITLE: Expert Lighting for Panoramic Padel Courts
LIGHTING_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Illuminate Your Game with Portico Sport's Padel Court Lighting!
LIGHTING_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Enjoy the ultimate LED lighting solution for padel courts, exclusively offered by Portico Sport in partnership with leading specialists in the field.

Our padel court lighting ensures optimal illumination and uniformity across all playing areas. From the net to the access zones, background, sidelines, and high ball zones, our lighting solution eliminates glare and shadows, providing players with unparalleled visibility and performance.

The quality of our projectors, designed to withstand impacts up to IK10, with IP66-IP67 sealing degrees and resistance to voltage surges of 4kV - 6kV, combined with high heat dissipation capabilities of the housings, allows for an extended lifespan of our projectors, with a warranty of up to 5 years.

Our projectors are designed to cover all types of courts specified in the European standard for sports lighting (UNE-EN-12193:2020), ranging from recreational use (Class III) to professional competitions or televised broadcasts (Class I - NIDE standard).

FIRST_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Discover our Club Padel Court, a top-choice for padel clubs worldwide! Built to withstand high winds and suitable for both indoor and outdoor, our Club Court offers unparalleled durability and versatility.

With a wide range of customization options available, we ensure that it seamlessly integrates into any environment. Renowned for its timeless design and robust construction, it's no wonder the Club Court remains one of our most sought-after offerings.

STRUCTURE_SECTION.TITLE: Structures
STRUCTURE_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Experience the excellence of our premium quality Padel court structure
STRUCTURE_SECTION.TEXT:
Crafted with galvanized steel structure, our court ensures maximum resistance to abrasion and oxidation.

The court structure consists of galvanized S275JR steel profiles, anchored securely to the ground using anchor plates. The side and top frames are complemented by electro-welded mesh in accordance with UNE-EN-10223-4 standards.

To prevent vibrations of the mesh, the structure includes intermediate scaffolding.

Fastening the structure to the pavement is achieved with countersunk metal anchors measuring M8X80 mm. Plus, its assembly process is seamless, thanks to self-locking safety screws and nuts made of galvanized steel.

The structure of Portico Sport padel courts undergoes manufacturing processes including cutting-edge industrial technologies such as:

  • Laser cutting guarantees precise cuts and delivers high-quality finishing.
  • A fully automated robotic welding assembly line guarantees the quality of welds, preventing potential oxidation in the future.
STRUCTURE_SECTION.SUBTEXT:
If you need your Club Padel court in tough weather conditions, you can upgrade its structure and transform it into a Club+ Padel Court with additional reinforcements using steel profiles, perfect for areas prone to extreme weather.

Enjoy the Club+ Padel Court, offering the same premium quality but with added robustness perfect to withstand higher wind gusts (131,40 km/h) and adverse weather conditions, ensuring seamless durability and high resistance.

Same length, reduced width enabling padel to be enjoyed 1vs1. This Padel court is also ideal for individual classes, specific training or to maximize utilization space in your club where a doubles court does not fit.

Despite its smaller size, it features the same premium quality and exceptional durability as the rest of our courts, making it a great choice for clubs looking to expand their offerings and provide this special court.

FIRST_SECTION.TITLE: Single Padel Court: Tailored for Solo Players!
FIRST_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
The perfect choice for honing specific skills and improving precision in your padel game.

With its reduced width, this court allows for intense one-on-one matches, making it ideal for individual training sessions or maximizing the use of space in your club.

Customizable to meet your preferences, our Single Court offers versatility and adaptability to suit your needs.

Portico Sport offers top-tier Single Padel courts designed to meet the needs of both professional and amateur players. Our Single Padel courts are perfect for smaller spaces while still providing the full Padel experience. Whether you need a court for a private residence, a club, or a resort, we have the expertise to deliver a high-quality solution that fits your requirements.

Our Single Padel courts are crafted with precision, using the best materials to ensure durability and performance. Each Padel court is designed to international standards, ensuring that you receive a product that is both functional and aesthetically pleasing.

BENEFITS_SECTION.TITLE: Experience the benefits of our Single Padel court
BENEFITS_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Why Choose a Single Padel Court?
BENEFITS_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Single Padel courts are ideal for those who have limited space but still want to enjoy the game. These Padel courts maintain all the key features of a standard Padel court but are designed to fit smaller areas, making them a versatile option for urban environments, private homes, and smaller clubs. They are a cost-effective solution that does not compromise on quality or playability.

BENEFITS.footer: Rest assured with our 10-year warranty on the structural integrity of our courts, designed to withstand high wind speeds.
Ideal for individual classes, specific training or to maximize utilization space  this court offers the same stability as conventional courts
Crafted with premium materials for maximum strength and durability, our courts offer premium quality.

STRUCTURE_SECTION.TITLE: Expert Padel Court Builders: Superior Structures
STRUCTURE_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Experience the excellence of our premium quality Padel court structure
STRUCTURE_SECTION.TEXT:
Crafted with galvanized steel structure, this court offers the same length but reduced width, always ensuring maximum resistance to abrasion and oxidation.

The court structure consists of galvanized S275JR steel profiles, anchored securely to the ground using anchor plates.

The side and top frames are complemented by electro-welded mesh in accordance with UNE-EN-10223-4 standards. To mitigate mesh vibrations, the structure incorporates intermediate scaffolding. Fastening the structure to the pavement is achieved with countersunk metal anchors measuring M8X80 mm. Plus, its assembly process is seamless, thanks to self-locking safety screws and nuts made of galvanized steel.

The structure of Portico Sport padel courts undergoes manufacturing processes including cutting-edge industrial technologies such as:

  • Laser cutting guarantees precise cuts and delivers high-quality finishing.
  • A fully automated robotic welding assembly line guarantees the quality of welds, preventing potential oxidation in the future.

IMAGE.alt: Interior and exterior Single court sizes
Mobile court patented by Portico Sport

GLASS_SECTION.TITLE: High-Quality Glass for Single Padel Courts
GLASS_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Tempered Safety Glass in Every Court!
GLASS_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Discover unrivaled safety and durability in our padel courts. Despite its size, our single court boasts the same aesthetic appeal as the rest of our courts and features tempered safety glass, available in either 10 or 12 mm thickness, tailored to the specific requirements of this court. Rest assured, our glass meets all regulatory standards for installations of this kind. Partnering with esteemed Spanish manufacturers boasting CE marking, we guarantee top-notch quality in every aspect of our construction.

GLAZING is done using clear tempered glass with polished edges, fixed to the metal structure using countersunk polyethylene bushings, galvanized screws and neoprene gaskets for perfect glass/metal support, with a total of 6 anchor holes. Our glass panels boast outstanding physical and mechanical properties, including impact resistance and optimal flatness.

PAINT_SECTION.TITLE: Vibrant Lacquer Options from Padel Court Builders
PAINT_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Did you know that now you can add a splash of color to your court?
PAINT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Discover the epitome of distinction in padel court construction with a range of lacquer types, providing endless options to paint your court's structures in vibrant hues. Our LACQUERED PAINT offers maximum resistance to abrasion and oxidation. Choose the RAL color that suits your preference and stand out on with our customizable color options.

Let your court reflect your unique style and personality by opting for a monochromatic appearance or injecting vibrant energy with a bicolor scheme. With the right paint, even a smaller court will stand out.

IMAGES.alt: Exterior of a yellow mobile court
Exterior of a yellow mobile court

LIST: INDOOR: powder coating formulated with thermos-fusible resins.
OUTDOOR: thermo-fusible powder primer treatment with a high zinc content formulated to improve the corrosion protection of galvanized steel.

HOT DIP GALVANIZED: treatment of molten zinc at a temperature of 450 ºC in order to achieve high protection of parts against corrosion in marine environments. Includes powder coating formulated with thermo-fusible resins.

TURF_SECTION.TITLE: High-Performance Turf for Single Padel Courts
TURF_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Experience Unmatched Performance on our Turf!
TURF_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
We partner with the top turf companies to ensure your court receives premium quality turf. Every court is equipped with the latest generation turf engineered with textured monofilaments, featuring different thickness and pile heights, very low abrasion, made of polyethylene (PE) and specific additives with high resistance to wear and anti-UV treatment, resistant to heat and extreme weather fluctuations.

Stabilization fill and ballast using rounded, washed and dried silica sand, with 97% silica, granulometry between 0,2 - 0,6 mm in an approximate quantity of 10-15 Kg/m2, depending on the lawn model.

Our cutting-edge turf guarantees padel players an optimized playing speed and improved ball bounce and offers the option of straight or curled fibers and is available in a wide variety of colors.

LIGHTING_SECTION.TITLE: LED Lighting Solutions by Padel Court Experts
LIGHTING_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Illuminate Your Game with Portico Sport's Padel Court Lighting!
LIGHTING_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Enjoy the ultimate LED lighting solution for padel courts, exclusively offered by Portico Sport in partnership with leading specialists in the field.

Our padel court lighting ensures optimal illumination and uniformity across all playing areas. From the net to the access zones, background, sidelines, and high ball zones, our lighting solution eliminates glare and shadows, providing players with unparalleled visibility and performance.

The quality of our projectors, designed to withstand impacts up to IK10, with IP66-IP67 sealing degrees and resistance to voltage surges of 4kV - 6kV, combined with high heat dissipation capabilities of the housings, allows for an extended lifespan of our projectors, with a warranty of up to 5 years.

Our projectors are designed to cover all types of courts specified in the European standard for sports lighting (UNE-EN-12193:2020), ranging from recreational use (Class III) to professional competitions or televised broadcasts (Class I - NIDE standard).

INSTALLATION_SECTION.TITLE: Custom Single Padel Court Installation
INSTALLATION_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: At Portico Sport, we offer custom Single Padel court installation tailored to your specific needs. From choosing the right surface to selecting the appropriate fencing and lighting, our team will work with you every step of the way to ensure that your court meets your expectations. We prioritize quality and safety in all our installations, providing you with a court that will last for years to come.

COST_SECTION.TITLE: How Much Does a Single Padel Court Cost?
COST_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: The cost of installing a Single Padel court can vary depending on factors such as the size of the court, the materials used, and any additional features like lighting or seating. We recommend contacting our team for a detailed quote tailored to your specific project.

Designed by Portico Sport's engineering department, this Padel court is manufactured with the same premium-quality materials as the rest of our Padel courts.

Despite being the smallest court, it offers the same stability, durability, and resistance. If you're looking for a compact padel court, the Mini Court is an excellent choice.

Not only does it provide a safe and enjoyable environment for kids to play, but it also offers numerous benefits for clubs: parents can play padel while their children engage in the sport, fostering a unique and welcoming atmosphere in the club.

Despite its compact size, our Mini Court boasts the same aesthetic appeal as conventional courts and offers exceptional wind resistance. Plus, with customizable options available, young players can feel like champions on the court.

Portico Sport, as a manufacturer and installer of Padel courts, also provide premium quality Mini Padel courts, perfect for those who want to enjoy the sport in smaller spaces. Our Mini Padel courts are designed to deliver the same level of enjoyment and competition as standard Padel courts but on a reduced scale, making them ideal for private homes, schools, and recreational areas.

Our Mini Padel courts are built with the same attention to detail and quality as our full-sized courts. We use top-grade materials to ensure that each court is durable, safe, and offers an excellent playing experience.

OUR_COMPANY.SEO_TITLE: Portico Sport Company - Leader in padel courts & canopies design and manufacture
OUR_COMPANY.SEO_DESCRIPTION: Portico Sport designs and manufactures premium padel courts and canopies in Spain, delivering turnkey solutions with in-house production, engineering excellence, and global reach.
OUR_COMPANY.TITLE: Our Company & Team

SECTION_1.TITLE: Padel built on engineering. Powered by innovation
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION:
Based in Spain, Portico Sport is a global leader in the design and manufacture of padel courts and canopies, with a proven track record since 2009. With over 4,000 courts installed in more than 35 countries, the company is defined by engineering excellence, design innovation, and complete project delivery—from concept to installation.

Founded by civil engineers with decades of industry experience, our engineering DNA enables us to offer a complete turnkey solution, combining padel courts and canopies with 100% in-house design and manufacturing. Through years of close collaboration between our engineers and sports specialists, we’ve continually evolved and refined our court systems—creating today’s highly recognised, competition-grade models trusted by clubs, federations, and professionals worldwide.

This commitment to continuous improvement is supported by our state-of-the-art production facility, inaugurated in 2023. It enables full in-house manufacturing, end-to-end traceability, and record-breaking production times thanks to advanced technologies such as robotic welding and specialised fabrication zones.

With this factory, Portico Sport is poised to lead a new era of global padel growth, meeting the demands of an increasingly sophisticated market with unmatched speed, precision, and quality.

SECTION_2.TITLE: A team of experts behind every padel court
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Portico Sport is more than a manufacturer—it’s a collective of experienced civil engineers, sports architects, and project managers with deep industry knowledge. From technical design and structural planning to final installation, our team ensures every project meets the highest international standards.

SUBTITLE_1.TITLE: Technical & design support
SUBTITLE_1.DESCRIPTION: Our technical team includes civil engineers, architects, and sports infrastructure specialists with decades of combined experience. From initial concept to site execution, we offer tailored support, including detailed 3D renders and videos, to help clients visualise their projects in full. We advise on optimal court layout, surface selection, and structural requirements—maximising every centimetre of space to deliver smarter, more efficient padel facilities.

SUBTITLE_2.TITLE: Skilled production professionals
SUBTITLE_2.DESCRIPTION: From steel cutting to robotic welding, surface finishing to final detailing, every padel court is shaped by skilled hands that understand the demands of elite sport. Our factory team brings specialist training and years of experience to every stage of the build—ensuring each component meets the highest standards of strength, durability, and finish.

SUBTITLE_3.TITLE: Global network of installers and distributors
SUBTITLE_3.DESCRIPTION: To ensure consistent delivery worldwide, Portico Sport works with a trusted global network of certified installers and distributors. All partners are carefully trained to meet our exacting standards—guaranteeing precision installation and expert local support, wherever your project is located.

SUBTITLE_4.TITLE: Ready to build your padel court with the best?
SUBTITLE_4.DESCRIPTION: Whether you're launching your first padel project or scaling up with a multi-court facility, our team is here to support you at every step. Get in touch to explore how Portico Sport can bring your padel vision to life—with world-class engineering, proven reliability, and global expertise you can trust.

OUR_SERVICES.SEO_TITLE: Portico Sport Services - Services that go beyond manufacturing
OUR_SERVICES.SEO_DESCRIPTION: Portico Sport delivers end-to-end padel court solutions worldwide, with expert support, certified installation, and tailored services to ensure smooth, high-quality project execution.
OUR_SERVICES.TITLE: Our Services

SECTION_1.TITLE: Comprehensive solutions for every padel project
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Portico Sport, we offer more than just padel court construction—we deliver a complete, end-to-end service designed to make your project efficient, smooth, and successful. With over 4,000 padel courts installed worldwide, we understand that every project is unique. That’s why we provide a wide range of services that go beyond manufacturing, including tailored technical assistance, certified installation, financial solutions, and expert site preparation guidance to support you every step of the way—with reliable service, expert advice, and the highest standards of quality.

SVC_1.TITLE: Technical assistance & project support
SVC_1.DESCRIPTION: Our team of in-house civil engineers, architects, and infrastructure experts provide bespoke technical assistance to every client. We work with you from the very beginning—offering strategic planning, space optimisation advice, and construction guidance.With enhanced 3D renders and digital walkthroughs, we help you visualise your court setup before construction begins. Our mission is to make complex decisions simple, and to guide you with solutions tailored to your site, goals, and budget.

SVC_2.TITLE: Ground preparation & construction guidance
SVC_2.DESCRIPTION: Building a padel court starts with solid foundations—literally. We advise our clients on site preparation, including slab construction, drainage planning, and concrete foundation requirements.To streamline your build, we also provide basic construction blueprints free of charge upon order confirmation. This ensures the groundwork is completed accurately and in line with your chosen court model, saving you time and avoiding costly corrections.

SVC_3.TITLE: Certified installation team worldwide
SVC_3.DESCRIPTION_1: Every padel court we manufacture is installed by a trusted team of certified installers and local distributors. Carefully trained to meet Portico Sport’s exacting standards, our installation team ensure every padel court and canopy is assembled with precision, safety, and care—anywhere in the world.
SVC_3.DESCRIPTION_2: This global network of professionals guarantees consistency, technical accuracy, and peace of mind throughout the installation process.

SVC_4.TITLE: Flexible financial services
SVC_4.DESCRIPTION: We understand that funding is a key part of bringing padel projects to life. That’s why we’ve secured exclusive partnerships with financial institutions to offer our clients flexible funding options. From leasing solutions to tailored financing plans, we work with clubs, federations, and developers to remove financial barriers and make high-quality padel infrastructure more accessible.

SVC_4.MINDSPRING_TITLE: Immediate financing for padel courts via mindspring partnership
SVC_4.MINDSPRING_DESCRIPTION: Portico Sports now offers its customers an exciting opportunity for immediate financing of their new courts via its global partnership with Mindspring Padel. As market leader in assisting clubs to integrate Padel, Mindspring Padel has a unique revenue share model which allows clubs to acquire new Portico Sports courts very easily and with no risk or cash outlay. So, if you're interested in 100% financing for Portico Sport Padel courts at your Tennis, Padel or sports club, contact Portico Sports or Mindspring Padel today!

SVC_5.TITLE: After-sales support
SVC_5.DESCRIPTION: At Portico Sport, we believe in building long-term relationships through quality, trust, and professionalism. With years of industry experience and a client-first approach, we offer comprehensive, personalised after-sales support to ensure customer satisfaction by providing technical assistance and expert advice to address any concerns and keep your padel facility performing at its best.

SVC_6.TITLE: Maintenance & upgrades
SVC_6.DESCRIPTION: Our commitment doesn’t end with installation. Portico Sport offers ongoing padel court maintenance services and a full range of spare parts and components—ensuring your court stays in top condition for years to come. We also support clubs and venues looking to upgrade their court models or add new features to enhance the playing experience. With our long-term technical support and access to original parts, you can extend the life and performance of your courts with total confidence.

SECTION_2.TITLE: Let’s build your padel project together.
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Whether you’re at the idea stage or ready to break ground, our team is here to help you succeed. Contact us today to discover how we can support your project with expert guidance, quality engineering, and premium service.

CREDENTIALS.SEO_TITLE: Credentials & Memberships | Portico Sport - Leading Padel Court Manufacturer
CREDENTIALS.SEO_DESCRIPTION: Portico Sport is a trusted leader in Padel court construction, backed by key industry memberships like SAPCA and the International Padel Cluster.
CREDENTIALS.TITLE: Industry Credentials & Certifications

CREDENTIALS_SECTION.TITLE: Portico Sport: Your Global Partner for Premium Quality Padel Courts
CREDENTIALS_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
With 15+ years of experience and 4,000+ courts installed across 35+ countries, Portico Sport is a global leader in Padel court construction and canopy solutions.

Our turnkey manufacturing process ensures 100% in-house design and production, delivering high-performance courts built for durability, aesthetics, and top-tier gameplay.

By overseeing every step—from raw materials to final installation—we guaranteeunmatched quality control and consistencyacross all our courts.

In 2023, we expanded with a 110,000 sq. ft. factory, making us the largest and most advanced Padel court manufacturer in the industry

At Portico Sport, we don’t just build courts—we create lasting partnerships, offeringcustom designs, financing options, and ongoing support to help clubs and venues thrive.

MEMBERSHIP_SECTION.TITLE: Committed to Industry Excellence: Our Professional Memberships
MEMBERSHIP_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Our expertise and commitment to excellence have earned us a place in key industry organizations, reinforcing our role in shaping the future of the sport. These memberships strengthen our connections within the global Padel community, ensuring we stay at the forefront of industry standards, innovation, and best practices.

CLUSTER_PADEL.TITLE: International Padel Cluster
CLUSTER_PADEL.DESCRIPTION:
The International Padel Cluster is a global alliance of companies dedicated to the development and international promotion of padel. It brings together leading manufacturers, distributors, and key players in the industry, primarily from within the European Union.

Sergio Tello Cendal, CEO of Portico Sport, serves as a member of the IPC Board of Directors, contributing his extensive expertise in the design and installation of high-performance padel courts. As part of the IPC, Portico Sport is committed to supporting the growth of padel worldwide, encouraging its inclusion in the Olympic Games, and promoting innovation and sustainability across the sector.

SAPCA_PADEL.TITLE: SAPCA UK: The Sports and Play Construction Association
SAPCA_PADEL.DESCRIPTION:
Portico Sport UK is member of SAPCA, the UK’s leading authority for the sports and play construction industry. SAPCA brings together trusted specialists who are committed to delivering excellence, innovation, and safety across every stage of sports facility development. Being part of this prestigious network reinforces our commitment to upholding the highest standards in sports construction across the UK.

We are also honoured to have been named a finalist in the SAPCA Awards 2025, which recognize the most outstanding achievements in the sector. Being recognized among the UK’s top sports construction projects is an incredible achievement and a true testament to our team's dedication, expertise, and passion for delivering high-quality padel facilities.

NORMATIVE_SECTION_LOGOS.TITLE: Building Padel Courts that comply with regulations
NORMATIVE_SECTION_LOGOS.SUBTITLE: Strength, durability and perfect integration
NORMATIVE_SECTION_LOGOS.DESCRIPTION: Our Padel courts are designed and developed by the engineering department of PORTICO SPORT to provide exceptional durability and outstanding performance. Our courts comply with the official sports regulations(NIDE 2004 Padel), the regulations and standards of the FIP (International Padel Federation) and structural calculation based on the Standard «Structural Steel Instruction(EAE)» and American Code: AISC-360 AND ASCE SEI 7-16-. Moreover, all our courts come with a 10-year guarantee (structural stability).

CERTIFICATION_SECTION.TITLE: Certified Quality – Built to the Highest Standards
CERTIFICATION_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
At Portico Sport, we are committed to delivering excellence in every court and canopy we build. That’s why we carefully select and verify that every material used in our padel solutions is of European origin and meets the strictest industry regulations, including UNE standards.

From structural steel to tempered glass and synthetic turf, each component undergoes rigorous quality control to ensure compliance with international benchmarks and superior real-game performance.

By maintaining these high standards, we provide clubs and players with courts that offer exceptional reliability, longevity, and playability.

Built to withstand intense, long-term use, our padel courts exceed industry standards in both performance and aesthetics, making them a smart investment for clubs and venues worldwide.

CANOPIES.SEO_DESCRIPTION: Elevate your game with our high-performance canopies, designed for durability and unparalleled play experience. Learn more!
CANOPIES.PRETITLE: Leader in the manufacturing and installation of canopies
CANOPIES.TITLE: Padel courts canopies
CANOPIES.SUBTITLE: Innovation, quality and high technology
CANOPIES.DESCRIPTION: Cover your Padel court with high-performance canopies that significantly extend the long-term usage of your court.

FIRST_SECTION.TITLE: Covered Padel Courts for Enhanced Durability
FIRST_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Designed by expert Padel court builders, our high-performance canopies offer unmatched protection from inclement weather while enhancing the playing experience. With an original design, weather-resistant materials and premium quality structure our canopies meet all safety standards. Additionally, the sleek, aesthetically pleasing design integrates seamlessly with any environment, making them both functional and visually appealing for any Padel club.

FEATURE_SECTION.TITLE: Custom-Built Padel Court Canopies by Expert Engineers
FEATURE_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: In Portico Sport, our team of expert engineers specializes in designing and developing construction and installation systems for Padel court canopies. Each canopy is tailored to the unique needs of our clients and complies with local standards and regulations in every country. Beyond Padel, our canopies are also ideal for other racquet sports like tennis, providing versatile, weather-resistant protection for multiple sports facilities.
LIST: Reduced heat projection compared to metal sheets canopies.
Reduced shadows and contrasts compared to opaque materials.
Increased brightness that optimizes the use of artificial lighting.
Reduced echo effect during gameplay.
Prevents discoloration of the turf due to UV rays.
Prevents crystal condensation.
Prevents rain from compacting the sand on the turf.
Soften potential expansions and contractions caused by sunlight on the structure and the turf.
FEATURE_SECTION.LIST_TITLE: Benefits of Padel court canopies: Maximize playtime and durability
FEATURE_SECTION.LIST_DESCRIPTION: Our canopies provide ultimate protection for every court, ensuring that weather conditions do not hinder the playing experience. Designed to enhance gameplay, these premium quality covers not only safeguard your courts but also contribute to a more enjoyable and consistent playing environment. Discover the benefits of investing in our state-of-the-art Padel court covers and take your game to the next level!

ADVANTAGE_SECTION.TITLE: Installation of Padel court canopies
ADVANTAGE_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
With years of expertise in engineering, Portico Sport oversees the entire construction process of Padel court canopies. Our dedicated team of professionals excels in every aspect, from design and manufacturing to installation.

We understand that each client has unique needs, and we approach every project with the personalized attention and respect it deserves. This commitment ensures the success of our projects, built on a foundation of quality, innovation, trust, and experience.

Our canopies are manufactured using hot-rolled structural steel profiles tailored to the specific dimensions required for each installation. The roofing features cellular polycarbonate sheets, available in various thicknesses depending on the project's requirements and conditions.

These materials provide the perfect characteristics for playing any racquet sport. Additionally, we offer the option to install side panels up to 3 meters high to shield against lateral winds and rain, enhancing the playing experience.

Choose Portico Sport for your Padel court canopy installation and Padel court builder and enjoy exceptional quality and performance tailored to your needs.

Additionally, clients can save on ground preparation expenses and permit acquisition as only a soil test is necessary to place the platform.

FEATURE_SECTION.TITLE:

our innovative elevated platform!
FEATURE_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Remarkable features

IMAGE.alt: Elevate your passion for padel to new heights

Quick and easy assembly.

ADVANTAGE_SECTION.TITLE:
Elevated Padel court platform:
Unmatched durability and great performance on any terrain
ADVANTAGE_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Discover our elevated platform, where versatility and durability come together to offer you an innovative solution in padel court installation. With our adjustable pillar system and unique assembly design, we streamline the process required so you can enjoy your padel court quicker and in a much wider range of different terrains, now the possibilities to where install your padel court are endless!
ADVANTAGE_SECTION.SUBTITLE: The benefits of our innovative elevated platform:
ADVANTAGES: Effortlessly overcomes terrain variations without the need for extensive and costly ground leveling or foundations.
Requires simple testing for placement, ensuring a hassle-free installation process.
Same 10-year warranty as all our padel courts.

INFORMATION_SECTION.TITLE: A platform designed to overcome any terrain
INFORMATION_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
The Portico Sport elevated platform is a structural solution that adapts to your terrain. Thanks to its adjustable pillar system, it overcomes the terrain limitations that normal padel courts bring with them without affecting the game experience. Its unique design and screwing system allow for quick and easy installation. This means that in no time, your platform will be ready to accommodate to any unevenness of the ground and facilitate the installation of any of our padel courts.

Our engineering department is at the forefront of the padel courts design and manufacturing industry, which is why each elevated platform undergoes rigorous procedures including seismic analysis, deformation limitation and verification of steel elements according to ASCE 7-SEI 2019 and AISC 360 2016 (LRFD) regulations, guaranteeing safety and quality in every detail to ensure optimal performance and unparalleled stability.

IMAGE.alt: Elevated platform patented by Portico Sport

TECHNICAL_FEATURES: Analysis of the limitation of the natural vibration frequency, ensuring that it is not less than 8 Hz, and behaving appropriately in this aspect.
Dynamic analysis of the structure, with an ASCE 7 seismic spectrum, calculated with a 0.3sec acceleration.

FACTORY.TITLE: Portico Sport: a Factory for the new era of Padel
FACTORY.SUBTITLE: Visit our factory
FACTORY.DESCRIPTION:
Inaugurated in 2023, the company boasts a cutting-edge factory spanning over 8.000 square meters, which integrates state-of-the-art industrial technology, a robotic welding assembly line, and industrial processes previously applied in more advanced industries.

As a result, Portico Sport has increased its production capacity, enhanced quality, modernized its production system, and reduced delivery times worldwide.

FACTORY_SECTION.PREFOOTER_SUBTITLE: The largest padel courts and canopies manufacturing site

FEATURE_SECTION.TITLE: Commitment to Excellence: Leading Padel Court Manufacturers for Padel Solutions Worldwide
FEATURE_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Drawing upon over 15 years of industry expertise and the construction of more than 4,000 courts, Portico Sport embarked on a new chapter in 2023 with the inauguration of a state-of-the-art factory. Spanning 8,000 square meters, the new facility integrates cutting-edge industrial technology, features a fully automated robotic welding assembly line, and employs advanced industrial steel processes previously exclusive to more sophisticated industries.

INFORMATION_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Today, Portico Sport has established its presence in over 35 countries worldwide. With the inauguration of this new factory, the company is poised to embrace a new era of padel growth with optimism within an increasingly demanding international industry landscape. This state-of-the-art facility stands as one of the largest and the most technologically advanced in the sector. It is equipped with distinct areas dedicated to design, manufacturing, welding, and paint & lacquering. Its innovative design and robust capacity enable us to maintain a 100% in-house manufacturing process, ensuring complete traceability of every material used and rigorous quality control measures. We have no excuses to make nothing but the best padel courts in the industry.

CONTACT_SECTION.TITLE: Contact us to book a visit to our Padel court manufacturing facility
CONTACT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Whether you are a potential client or a professional distributor interested in our courts and canopies, We extend a warm invitation to visit our facilities. Our team of experts eagerly awaits the opportunity to guide you through our design, production, manufacturing, and lacquering plants, providing an in-depth exploration of the entire construction process from inception to completion. You'll have the chance to delve into every aspect of our production process, from meticulous materials selection to the cutting-edge engineering techniques that enable us to craft the finest courts in the industry.

This exclusive opportunity offers insight into why our courts and canopies are so highly esteemed by professional players and club owners worldwide. Moreover, you'll have the firsthand experience of our court quality by partaking in a game on one of them.
We eagerly anticipate your visit to our facilities, where we can share our passion for padel and showcase the excellence of our craftsmanship.

INTRO_SECTION.TITLE: Funding for Padel Courts
INTRO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
At Portico Sport, we understand that building a Padel court is a thrilling undertaking and a substantial investment. That’s why we offer tailored padel court funding solutions , including exclusive global partnerships like Mindspring Padel, and tailored agreements with leading financial institutions

Our collaborations with banks and financial institutions provide access to a wide range of services, including leasing and debt financing. These options are designed to meet the unique requirements of each client, offering competitive terms and conditions to suit your needs.

SECTION_MINDSPRING.TITLE: Immediate financing for padel courts via mindspring partnership
SECTION_MINDSPRING.DESCRIPTION: Portico Sports now offers its customers an exciting opportunity for immediate financing of their new courts via its global partnership with Mindspring Padel. As market leader in assisting clubs to integrate Padel, Mindspring Padel has a unique revenue share model which allows clubs to acquire new Portico Sports courts very easily and with no risk or cash outlay. So, if you're interested in 100% financing for Portico Sport Padel courts at your Tennis, Padel or sports club, contact Portico Sports or Mindspring Padel today!

FINANCING_SECTION.TITLE: Best Padel court builders with financing programs
FINANCING_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:

Our collaborations with banks and financial institutions provide access to a wide range of services, including leasing and debt financing. These options are designed to meet the unique requirements of each client, offering competitive terms and conditions to suit your needs.

POINT_1.TITLE: Leasing
POINT_1.DESCRIPTION: Ideal for businesses and individuals looking to acquire assets without a significant upfront investment. Spread payments over time and retain the option to own the court at the end of the lease.

POINT_2.TITLE: Debt Financing

POLICIES.TITLE: 1. Purpose

POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_3: In this regard, and in order to provide the user with all the necessary information for correct browsing, we provide the following informative text on what cookies are, what types of cookies exist on our Website, and how you can configure or disable them.

WHAT_IS.TITLE: 2. What are cookies?
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_1: Currently, most websites, regardless of the service they provide, use cookies. Cookies are small text files or devices that are downloaded to the user's terminal when browsing websites in order to store data that can later be retrieved by the entity responsible for their installation, facilitating navigation and the user experience.
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_2: As stated in Recital 30 of the GDPR, individuals can be linked to online identifiers provided by their devices, applications, tools, and protocols, such as IP addresses or session identifiers in the form of  or other identifiers with similar purposes. This may leave traces that, especially when combined with unique identifiers and other data received by servers, can be used to create profiles of individuals and identify them.
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_3: For this reason, the website owner has a cookie policy that complies with applicable regulations.
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_4: In general, when the installation and/or use of cookies involves the processing of personal data, whether they are first-party or third-party, session or persistent cookies, the data controller will provide the necessary information in this area and obtain the user's prior informed consent to install and/or use them, except in cases where strictly necessary cookies must be installed. Only those cookies that allow communication between the user's device and the network or those used to provide a service requested by the user are exempt from such consent. For example, “technical cookies” (e.g., those necessary for navigating the platform), “customization or configuration cookies” (e.g., those that allow the page to recognize the user's language), and “security cookies” (e.g., those used to detect repeated failed connection attempts).

TYPES.TITLE: 3. Types, purpose, and Functionality of Cookies
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1: First-party cookies: Sent to your device from the server or domain of the website owner from which the requested service is provided.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2: Third-party cookies: Sent o your device from a server or domain not managed by us but by a partner entity, such as social networks or external content providers like Google.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_3: Session cookies: Temporary cookies stored in your browser's cookie file until you leave the website. No information is stored on your computer’s hard drive.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_4: Persistent cookies: Stored on the hard drive and read by our website each time you revisit. They have an expiration date, after which they stop functioning. They are generally used for shopping or registration services.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_5: Technical cookies: Necessary for navigation and proper functioning of the website (e.g., traffic control, security, or purchase processes).
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_6: Customization cookies: Allow you to access the service with predefined features (e.g., language or browser type).
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_7: Analytics cookies: Help quantify users and analyze how services are used to improve the website.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_8: Advertising cookies: Manage ad spaces on the website.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_9: Behavioral advertising cookies: Store information on user behavior to display ads based on browsing habits.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_10: Social cookies: Used to share content on social media platforms.

SITE_COOKIES.TITLE: 4. Cookies used on the Website

DISABLE.TITLE: 6. What Happens if Cookies are Disabled?
DISABLE.DESCRIPTION_1: If you reject cookies, you will still be able to use our website, but some of the services and/or links may stop working, it may not be possible to start or maintain an interactive session with the website's services, and we will not be able to obtain valuable information from you to offer content tailored to your interests and to help you access the information you are interested in quickly and easily.

NORMATIVE_SECTION_LOGOS.TITLE: Building Padel Courts that comply with regulations
NORMATIVE_SECTION_LOGOS.SUBTITLE: Strength, durability and perfect integration
NORMATIVE_SECTION_LOGOS.DESCRIPTION: Every Portico Sport padel court is designed and engineered in-house to meet the highest international standards. Our courts comply with official sports regulations (NIDE 2004 Padel), international padel standards, and structural calculations based on the Structural Steel Instruction (EAE) and American codes AISC-360 and ASCE SEI 7-16. As a top padel court supplier, we ensure price transparency without compromising on quality—backed by a 10-year guarantee on structural stability.

NORMATIVE_SECTION_LOGOS_UK.TITLE: Building Padel courts that comply with regulations
NORMATIVE_SECTION_LOGOS_UK.SUBTITLE: Strength and durability
NORMATIVE_SECTION_LOGOS_UK.DESCRIPTION: At Portico Sport UK, our padel courts are designed and developed by PORTICO SPORT’s engineering department to ensure exceptional durability and outstanding performance. They comply with official sports regulations (NIDE 2004 Padel), international padel standards, and structural calculations based on the Structural Steel Instruction (EAE) and American codes AISC-360 and ASCE SEI 7-16. Moreover, all our courts come with a 10-year guarantee for structural stability.

sections.description: These cookies are essential for the operation of the website and cannot be disabled in our systems. They allow navigation on the site and access to secure areas. Without these cookies, the requested services cannot be provided.

sections.title: Functionality Cookies
sections.description: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third-party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies, some services may not function properly.

sections.title: Analytics Cookies
sections.description: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information collected by these cookies is aggregated and therefore anonymous.
